title: Will Project Skins be hitting the rift again this year?
body:
Aside from Star Guardian skins, I've been waiting for Project to finally arrive this year as well.
Will we be seeing them again this year?

replies.body: Project skins should still be available in the store!  We don't have any info on upcoming or new content until it's announced, though.  If you have any ideas for new project skins, let us know on the [concept boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts)
